DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , efficacy sofosbuvir ( GS-7977 ; PSI-7977 ) administer combination pegylated interferon ribavirin ( PEG/RBV ) treatment-naive patient HCV genotypes 1,4,5,6 , indeterminate genotype .
DOC.brief_title: Sofosbuvir With Pegylated Interferon Ribavirin Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) Genotypes 1,4,5,6
DOC.criteria: Males females Chronic Hepatitis C ( HCV ) Genotype 1,4,5,6 , indeterminate Naive previous HCV treatment Positive HBsAg , antiHBc IgM Ab , antiHIV Ab History clinically significant chronic liver disease
